name: Miso-Glazed Salmon
author: WhatsCookingwithKids
summary: Delicious and simple to prepare, this recipe takes nearly an instant to prepare, especially when your young sous-chefs join you in the kitchen.
directions: Whisk together the sake, miso paste, mirin, soy sauce, and brown sugar in a baking dish
Add the salmon, and allow to rest for 5 minutes before flipping the fillets over in the marinade to coat
Bring salmon to room temperature, about 15 minutes, then remove salmon from the marinade, and shake off excess
Heat a large skillet over medium-high heat
Arrange salmon in the skillet, and cook until the fish flakes easily with a fork, about 4 minutes on each side
Transfer the fish to a plate and garnish with basil
